title: Kalista bug
body: If you play Kalista and you throw a Q at the gromp (enemy sides) if it's near the enemy teams minions it will start auto attacking them. This isn't game breaking but it loses cs for your team

replies.body:
That is not a bug. It can be done with many champions that have long-range abilities, such as Nidalee, Ezreal or even Nocturne. It's got to do with the way jungle creeps aggro. You can use this to your advantage, you know.

It won't do much though, because Gromp doesn't like to leave his area.
